metadata.title: CVE-2011-3171

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 10 SP4 for AMD64 and Intel EM64T
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 10 SP4 for IBM POWER
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 10 SP4 for IBM zSeries 64bit
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 10 SP4 for IPF
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 10 SP4 for x86
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP 10 SP3
SUSE Linux Enterprise Teradata 10 SP3 for AMD64 and Intel EM64T

metadata.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in pure-FTPd 1.0.22 and possibly other versions, when running on SUSE Linux Enterprise Server and possibly other operating systems, when the Netware OES remote server feature is enabled, allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files via unknown vectors.
